availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Schild (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, brewer)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, brewer. Native of Hanover. Married to Jane Schild. Father of Elizabeth Schild, George Schild, Henrietta Schild, Edward Schild, William Schild. Brewer in Kenton County in 1860. Employed Joseph Wagner in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, 4th Ward of Covington, p. 897.
Find A Grave, "William Schild (April 4, 1819-August 11, 1861)," Memorial #86285034, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/86285034 (accessed February 12, 2019).
